name: Mall Parking Lot (Northeast)
description: The northeastern quadrant of the Mall's exterior transit zone, where the self-repairing chrono-pavement displays algorithmically generated 'micro-fractures,' a subtle, aesthetically integrated reminder of simulated entropy. Genetically modified flora, designed for optimal visual contrast, artfully protrudes through these fissures. A single, bio-luminescent light column emits a precisely calibrated, subtly flickering glow, even during peak simulated daylight hours. The distant, harmonic thrum of the Mall's climate control and internal grav-lift systems is the only discernible auditory input, a constant reminder of the meticulously managed environment.
